import React from "react"; import Book from "./Book"; const catagories = ["Currently Reading", "Want to Read", "Read"]; function BookShelf() { return (
{catagories.map((item, index) => (

{item}

  1. To Kill a Mockingbird
    Harper Lee
  2. Ender's Game
    Orson Scott Card
))}
); } export default BookShelf;
